Project Examples

Last updated on 2023-12-12 | Edit this page

Interactive audio

The reading glove Story embedded on real, physical objects that can be played with and moved around. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UE6vllYI5RI&t=1s

Interactive Video

Italia Terremota: This interactive documentary combines 3D visualisation and multi-modal storytelling to tell the story of Senerchia terremotata, that is, the earthquake that devastated the Irpinia region (South Italy) in 1980.

Multi-engagement project

Emotive: EU-funded research project that works from the premise that cultural sites are highly emotional places. https://emotiveproject.eu/pages/summary/index.html

Online multidimensional exploration tool

Tapestry-Cyark: Platform for building and telling place-based stories on web and mobile devices”. https://tapestry.cyark.org/
